false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"_bountyId","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_changer","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_approvers","type":"address[]"}],"name":"BountyApproversUpdated","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"_bountyId","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_changer","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_data","type":"string"}],"name":"BountyDataChanged","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"_bountyId","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_changer","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_deadline","type":"uint256"}],"name":"BountyDeadlineChanged","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Mark Beylin <mark.beylin@consensys.net>, Gon\u00e7alo S\u00e1 <goncalo.sa@consensys.net>, Kevin Owocki <kevin.owocki@consensys.net>, Ricardo Guilherme Schmidt (@3esmit), Matt Garnett <matt.garnett@consensys.net>, Craig Williams <craig.williams@consensys.net>","details":"A contract for issuing bounties on Ethereum paying in ETH, ERC20, or ERC721 tokens","methods":{"acceptFulfillment(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"acceptFulfillment(): Allows any of the approvers to accept a given submission","params":{"_approverId":"the index of the approver which is making the call","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_fulfillmentId":"the index of the fulfillment to be accepted","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)","_tokenAmounts":"the array of token amounts which will be paid to the                      fulfillers, whose length should equal the length of the                      _fulfillers array of the submission. If the bounty pays                      in ERC721 tokens, then these should be the token IDs                      being sent to each of the individual fulfillers"}},"addApprovers(address,uint256,uint256,address[])":{"details":"addApprovers(): Allows any of the issuers to add more approvers to the bounty","params":{"_approvers":"the array of addresses to add to the list of valid approvers","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"addIssuers(address,uint256,uint256,address[])":{"details":"addIssuers(): Allows any of the issuers to add more issuers to the bounty","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_issuers":"the array of addresses to add to the list of valid issuers","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"changeApprover(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"changeApprover(): Allows any of the issuers to change a particular approver of the bounty","params":{"_approver":"the address of the new approver","_approverId":"the index of the approver who is being changed","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"changeBounty(address,uint256,uint256,address[],address[],string,uint256)":{"details":"changeBounty(): Allows any of the issuers to change the bounty","params":{"_approvers":"the new array of addresses who will be the approvers of the bounty","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_data":"the new IPFS hash representing the JSON object storing the details of the bounty (see docs for schema details)","_deadline":"the new timestamp which will become the deadline of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_issuers":"the new array of addresses who will be the issuers of the bounty","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"changeData(address,uint256,uint256,string)":{"details":"changeData(): Allows any of the issuers to change the data the bounty","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_data":"the new IPFS hash representing the JSON object storing the details of the bounty (see docs for schema details)","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"changeDeadline(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"changeDeadline(): Allows any of the issuers to change the deadline the bounty","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_deadline":"the new timestamp which will become the deadline of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"changeIssuer(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"changeIssuer(): Allows any of the issuers to change a particular issuer of the bounty","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_issuerIdToChange":"the index of the issuer who is being changed","_newIssuer":"the address of the new issuer","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"contribute(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"contribute(): Allows users to contribute tokens to a given bounty.                    Contributing merits no privelages to administer the                    funds in the bounty or accept submissions. Contributions                    are refundable but only on the condition that the deadline                    has elapsed, and the bounty has not yet paid out any funds.                    All funds deposited in a bounty are at the mercy of a                    bounty's issuers and approvers, so please be careful!","params":{"_amount":"the amount of tokens being contributed","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"drainBounty(address,uint256,uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"drainBounty(): Allows an issuer to drain the funds from the bounty","params":{"_amounts":"an array of amounts of tokens to be sent. The length of the array should be 1 if the bounty is in ETH or ERC20 tokens. If it's an ERC721 bounty, the array should be the list of tokenIDs.","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is making the call","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"fulfillAndAccept(address,uint256,address[],string,uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"fulfillAndAccept(): Allows any of the approvers to fulfill and accept a submission simultaneously","params":{"_approverId":"the index of the approver which is making the call","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_data":"the IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the submission (see docs for schema details)","_fulfillers":"the array of addresses which will receive payouts for the submission","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)","_tokenAmounts":"the array of token amounts which will be paid to the                      fulfillers, whose length should equal the length of the                      _fulfillers array of the submission. If the bounty pays                      in ERC721 tokens, then these should be the token IDs                      being sent to each of the individual fulfillers"}},"fulfillBounty(address,uint256,address[],string)":{"details":"fulfillBounty(): Allows users to fulfill the bounty to get paid out","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_data":"the IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the submission (see docs for schema details)","_fulfillers":"the array of addresses which will receive payouts for the submission","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"getBounty(uint256)":{"details":"getBounty(): Returns the details of the bounty","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty"},"return":"Returns a tuple for the bounty"},"issueAndContribute(address,address[],address[],string,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_depositAmount":"the amount of tokens being deposited to the bounty, which will create a new contribution to the bounty"}},"issueBounty(address,address[],address[],string,uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"issueBounty(): creates a new bounty","params":{"_approvers":"the array of addresses who will be the approvers of the bounty","_data":"the IPFS hash representing the JSON object storing the details of the bounty (see docs for schema details)","_deadline":"the timestamp which will become the deadline of the bounty","_issuers":"the array of addresses who will be the issuers of the bounty","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)","_token":"the address of the token which will be used for the bounty","_tokenVersion":"the version of the token being used for the bounty (0 for ETH, 20 for ERC20, 721 for ERC721)"}},"performAction(address,uint256,string)":{"details":"performAction(): Allows users to perform any generalized action                       associated with a particular bounty, such as applying for it","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_data":"the IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the action being performed (see docs for schema details)","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"refundContribution(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"refundContribution(): Allows users to refund the contributions they've                            made to a particular bounty, but only if the bounty                            has not yet paid out, and the deadline has elapsed.","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_contributionId":"the index of the contribution being refunded","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"refundContributions(address,uint256,uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"refundContributions(): Allows users to refund their contributions in bulk","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_contributionIds":"the array of indexes of the contributions being refunded","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is making the call","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"refundMyContributions(address,uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"refundMyContributions(): Allows users to refund their contributions in bulk","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_contributionIds":"the array of indexes of the contributions being refunded","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"replaceApprovers(address,uint256,uint256,address[])":{"details":"replaceApprovers(): Allows any of the issuers to replace the approvers of the bounty","params":{"_approvers":"the array of addresses to replace the list of valid approvers","_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"replaceIssuers(address,uint256,uint256,address[])":{"details":"replaceIssuers(): Allows any of the issuers to replace the issuers of the bounty","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_issuerId":"the index of the issuer who is calling the function","_issuers":"the array of addresses to replace the list of valid issuers","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}},"setMetaTxRelayer(address)":{"details":"setMetaTxRelayer(): Sets the address of the meta transaction relayer","params":{"_relayer":"the address of the relayer"}},"updateFulfillment(address,uint256,uint256,address[],string)":{"details":"updateFulfillment(): Allows the submitter of a fulfillment to update their submission","params":{"_bountyId":"the index of the bounty","_data":"the new IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the submission (see docs for schema details)","_fulfillers":"the new array of addresses which will receive payouts for the submission","_fulfillmentId":"the index of the fulfillment","_sender":"the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)"}}},"title":"StandardBounties"},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/chadoh/code/a/oe/shared/integrations/StandardBounties/contracts/StandardBounties.sol":"StandardBounties"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/chadoh/code/a/oe/shared/integrations/StandardBounties/contracts/StandardBounties.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7cf7d7c3bf534079ab95f8fe882b90768dab02bc5415bd58982915d455c56799","urls":["bzzr://12ce94cb4b0dfbd5f72859487dd4e97d5e6dbc60d54234be691cb9ac80be9270"]},"/Users/chadoh/code/a/oe/shared/integrations/StandardBounties/contracts/inherited/ERC20Token.sol":{"keccak256":"0x49355ee0934292f18ddbfe6bf1a7d602cc9a04360be1e859cb5eeeb78cb5ca8f","urls":["bzzr://d13cc8fb4503de612e1cfc3a357ff877b1840612f409ae5ba0616a36b9cc6a05"]},"/Users/chadoh/code/a/oe/shared/integrations/StandardBounties/contracts/inherited/ERC721Basic.sol":{"keccak256":"0xefcc02e00dc538aab12fe32ec9ef65539d6c5b8a6e9f33121bd55c100feceeeb","urls":["bzzr://4c5c2208b62931858ce20d65cc35b0e2bb82227592f8c693097973259120b430"]},"/Users/chadoh/code/a/oe/shared/integrations/StandardBounties/contracts/inherited/Token.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc7be9018d010474d47ed7b88c2435cb535fa86a82b92b31079f79e7e0fde8a38","urls":["bzzr://48cd4068f08044634813e0fb71b6be2d0809b7f4022071360ea842b68fe1f42a"]}},"version":1}

devdoc.author: Mark Beylin <mark.beylin@consensys.net>, Gonçalo Sá <goncalo.sa@consensys.net>, Kevin Owocki <kevin.owocki@consensys.net>, Ricardo Guilherme Schmidt (@3esmit), Matt Garnett <matt.garnett@consensys.net>, Craig Williams <craig.williams@consensys.net>
devdoc.details: A contract for issuing bounties on Ethereum paying in ETH, ERC20, or ERC721 tokens

acceptFulfillment(address,uint256,uint25.details: acceptFulfillment(): Allows any of the approvers to accept a given submission

params._approverId: the index of the approver which is making the call
params._fulfillmentId: the index of the fulfillment to be accepted
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)
params._tokenAmounts: the array of token amounts which will be paid to the                      fulfillers, whose length should equal the length of the                      _fulfillers array of the submission. If the bounty pays                      in ERC721 tokens, then these should be the token IDs                      being sent to each of the individual fulfillers

addApprovers(address,uint256,uint256,add.details: addApprovers(): Allows any of the issuers to add more approvers to the bounty

params._approvers: the array of addresses to add to the list of valid approvers
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

addIssuers(address,uint256,uint256,addre.details: addIssuers(): Allows any of the issuers to add more issuers to the bounty

params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._issuers: the array of addresses to add to the list of valid issuers
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

changeApprover(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: changeApprover(): Allows any of the issuers to change a particular approver of the bounty

params._approver: the address of the new approver
params._approverId: the index of the approver who is being changed
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

changeBounty(address,uint256,uint256,add.details: changeBounty(): Allows any of the issuers to change the bounty

params._approvers: the new array of addresses who will be the approvers of the bounty
params._data: the new IPFS hash representing the JSON object storing the details of the bounty (see docs for schema details)
params._deadline: the new timestamp which will become the deadline of the bounty
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._issuers: the new array of addresses who will be the issuers of the bounty
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

changeData(address,uint256,uint256,strin.details: changeData(): Allows any of the issuers to change the data the bounty

params._data: the new IPFS hash representing the JSON object storing the details of the bounty (see docs for schema details)
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

changeDeadline(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: changeDeadline(): Allows any of the issuers to change the deadline the bounty

params._deadline: the new timestamp which will become the deadline of the bounty
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

changeIssuer(address,uint256,uint256,uin.details: changeIssuer(): Allows any of the issuers to change a particular issuer of the bounty

params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._issuerIdToChange: the index of the issuer who is being changed
params._newIssuer: the address of the new issuer
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

contribute(address,uint256,uint256).details: contribute(): Allows users to contribute tokens to a given bounty.                    Contributing merits no privelages to administer the                    funds in the bounty or accept submissions. Contributions                    are refundable but only on the condition that the deadline                    has elapsed, and the bounty has not yet paid out any funds.                    All funds deposited in a bounty are at the mercy of a                    bounty's issuers and approvers, so please be careful!

params._amount: the amount of tokens being contributed
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

drainBounty(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: drainBounty(): Allows an issuer to drain the funds from the bounty

params._amounts: an array of amounts of tokens to be sent. The length of the array should be 1 if the bounty is in ETH or ERC20 tokens. If it's an ERC721 bounty, the array should be the list of tokenIDs.
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is making the call
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

fulfillAndAccept(address,uint256,address.details: fulfillAndAccept(): Allows any of the approvers to fulfill and accept a submission simultaneously

params._approverId: the index of the approver which is making the call
params._data: the IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the submission (see docs for schema details)
params._fulfillers: the array of addresses which will receive payouts for the submission
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)
params._tokenAmounts: the array of token amounts which will be paid to the                      fulfillers, whose length should equal the length of the                      _fulfillers array of the submission. If the bounty pays                      in ERC721 tokens, then these should be the token IDs                      being sent to each of the individual fulfillers

fulfillBounty(address,uint256,address[],.details: fulfillBounty(): Allows users to fulfill the bounty to get paid out

params._data: the IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the submission (see docs for schema details)
params._fulfillers: the array of addresses which will receive payouts for the submission
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

getBounty(uint256).details: getBounty(): Returns the details of the bounty
getBounty(uint256).return: Returns a tuple for the bounty

params._depositAmount: the amount of tokens being deposited to the bounty, which will create a new contribution to the bounty

params._approvers: the array of addresses who will be the approvers of the bounty
params._data: the IPFS hash representing the JSON object storing the details of the bounty (see docs for schema details)
params._deadline: the timestamp which will become the deadline of the bounty
params._issuers: the array of addresses who will be the issuers of the bounty
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)
params._token: the address of the token which will be used for the bounty
params._tokenVersion: the version of the token being used for the bounty (0 for ETH, 20 for ERC20, 721 for ERC721)

performAction(address,uint256,string).details: performAction(): Allows users to perform any generalized action                       associated with a particular bounty, such as applying for it

params._data: the IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the action being performed (see docs for schema details)
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

refundContribution(address,uint256,uint2.details: refundContribution(): Allows users to refund the contributions they've                            made to a particular bounty, but only if the bounty                            has not yet paid out, and the deadline has elapsed.

params._contributionId: the index of the contribution being refunded
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

refundContributions(address,uint256,uint.details: refundContributions(): Allows users to refund their contributions in bulk

params._contributionIds: the array of indexes of the contributions being refunded
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is making the call
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

refundMyContributions(address,uint256,ui.details: refundMyContributions(): Allows users to refund their contributions in bulk

params._contributionIds: the array of indexes of the contributions being refunded
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

replaceApprovers(address,uint256,uint256.details: replaceApprovers(): Allows any of the issuers to replace the approvers of the bounty

params._approvers: the array of addresses to replace the list of valid approvers
params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

replaceIssuers(address,uint256,uint256,a.details: replaceIssuers(): Allows any of the issuers to replace the issuers of the bounty

params._issuerId: the index of the issuer who is calling the function
params._issuers: the array of addresses to replace the list of valid issuers
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

setMetaTxRelayer(address).details: setMetaTxRelayer(): Sets the address of the meta transaction relayer

updateFulfillment(address,uint256,uint25.details: updateFulfillment(): Allows the submitter of a fulfillment to update their submission

params._data: the new IPFS hash corresponding to a JSON object which contains the details of the submission (see docs for schema details)
params._fulfillers: the new array of addresses which will receive payouts for the submission
params._sender: the sender of the transaction issuing the bounty (should be the same as msg.sender unless the txn is called by the meta tx relayer)

devdoc.title: StandardBounties
